Action.AddIRCMessage: @channel Finished with the tools for Dragon Lord Op
Great job, there is a communication task for you
Also, well done @Vortex, your client replied with a satisfaction, you will get next one soon
Keep going everybody
@channel We have a problem
What is it?
A few PIs are investigating our infrastructure, probably work for Lao Zhin
Dispose of them
As violent as possible, so others would know
I contacted Scalpel, they will be quartered
Shuriken Alliance is under attack of someone named Dreadnought, we are on our own
Ok, prepare for the final stage
@Vortex, contract completed, take next one
@channel Well done everyone, operation Dragon Lord is complete
Well done guys
How much did you get?
Quarter of a million
Holy fuck
Everyone involved will get their cut in a few days
How is the progress with Search mission?

Omicron - real name is unknown, seems to be some kind of legend in narrow circles. Presumed dead but I would doubt it, he disappeared several times before and yet came back. Has a large hacking potential, he led a very difficult operations, even fucked with FBI

His last job was to help drug cartel with FBI interfierence, something gone wrong and cops find out about everything, got to Omicron's moles and later on Feds got the cartel. Meantime, Omicron was shot by cartel's killers for that fuck up, but I used similar maneuver before, I think he just layed low for a while, we keep digging deeper
Ok, keep going, Jenkins will help you
@Vortex, you can see that we are doing our part here. Same as you as I can see, your client accepted your results
Take next contract
@channel Report everyone
Me and Prophet found some clues with Jenkins' help
Done my personal matter, but in a bit more bloody manner than I thought
Good. @Vortex I just got another contract confirmation. Your performance is great, I think there is only one contract left actually
Take it
@channel we've got something really interesting
What is it?
A solid lead on Omicron, and that is useful to whole group
Thing is, he is preparing for something big, he searches for potential partners for some big time job
And paying is going to be a lot more generous than Operation Dragon Lord
A whole million?
Exactly, and believe me, he is not messing around
Can you contact him?
From what I can see, no. We need to attract his attention
We need a big and controversial job to do. I will make a few calls and in the meantime, can someone explain to Vortex one obvious thing?

Ah, sure. @Vortex, you need to understand something. Our deal was about finding him, not to go against him. I know you have some sort of personal vendetta with him, but you need to cooldown. If he will approach us with a business proposition, then we will take it. And if you refuse to cooperate, you will be dealing with us as enemies
Am I making all things clear to you?
After all your business with him is done, you won't get in my way
Unless he pays for protection
All right. I have a job for us, win-win situation. Operation Venomous Snake
Client wants to extort one medical facility and we need to upload some ransomware
Our main targets are life support units. We need to place ransomware that can deactivate them
So as I said, it will be win-win situation. We either will get money and some attention, or a lot of notoriety for killing 50-60 people
That will help us to get new clients and maybe even make Omicron to notice us. Man, can't stop thinking about that million $ he can offer
One step at a time. First, we need an actual ransomware
Nearly finished it, what sum I need to input?
Make it 75 grand for each unit
Got it
@Vortex, you will participate as well. As a Covert Specialist and a smart guy in general, you will need to attack 5 units, that are best protected and out of reach for now
Others will attack main complex
@channel I'll send details via email. Good luck, gentlemen
